references.paper_title: Online bandit learning against an adaptive adversary: from regret to policy regret
references.reason: This paper provides foundational work on online bandit learning against adaptive adversaries, which is relevant to the context of online model selection with decentralized data
This paper is highly influential in model selection, which is a central problem addressed in online model selection

references.paper_title: Parameter-free online learning via model selection
references.reason: This work introduces parameter-free online learning, providing a relevant method to the problem of online model selection

references.paper_title: Regret analysis of stochastic and nonstochastic multi-armed bandit problems
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of multi-armed bandit problems, offering valuable insights into the regret analysis of online learning algorithms
This book provides a fundamental and extensive treatment of prediction, learning, and game theory, all of which are foundational concepts relevant to the paper
